original_text: Yet was she carried away, she went into captivity: her young children also were dashed in pieces at the top of all the streets: and they cast lots for her honourable men, and all her great men were bound in chains.
korean_text: 그가 포로가 되어 사로잡혀 갔고 그의 어린 아이들은 길 모퉁이 모퉁이에 메어침을 당하여 부서졌으며 그의 존귀한 자들은 제비 뽑혀 나뉘었고 그의 모든 권세자들은 사슬에 결박되었나니

sentences.original_text: her young children also were dashed in pieces
at the top of all the streets
and they cast lots for her honourable men
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 그녀의 존귀한 자들을 위하여 제비를 뽑았다

sentences.original_text: and all her great men were bound in chains
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그녀의 모든 위대한 자들은 쇠사슬에 묶였다
